name: More than u no
description:
On an evening like any other in a small-town saloon, Hannah meets Charlotte and feels immediately drawn to her. Their meeting turns into more than a heart to heart when they're challenged to a daring game of cards...

Made by:
Writing - Malindy Hetfeld @yourkyotowife
Art - L.usie https://www.instagram.com/l.usie/
Programming - Grhyll @Grhyll

Font HVD Comic Serif Pro made by HVD Fonts
Font Tucson Two Step NF made by Nick Curtis

This game was made for the Gay Western Jam Hosted by Robert Yang.
